scenes.text: Welcome to the Work Shop. What can I help you with?
What would you like to buy?

§lThese are the available Regular Kits at the Workshop.
§rAll Kits come with §6full stacks, §rand a §6 Colored Shulker Box
§r§lRegular Kits:
§r1 Smithing Templates Kit for 5,000 Moneyz
§r1 Brewing Kit for 2,000 Moneyz
§r1 Wood Kit for 1,000 Moneyz
§r1 Banner Kit for 500 Moneyz
§r1 Dye Kit for 500 Moneyz
§r1 Pottery Sherds Kit for 500 Moneyz
